<ce:section-title id="st035">Preparation</ce:section-title><ce:section-title id="st040">
<ce:italic>catena</ce:italic>-[(3-Hampy)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>[Zn<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>(N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>(3-ampy)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>]·3H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O] (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0030" view="all">The complex was prepared by dissolving 3-aminopyridine (0.43<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 4.6<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in an aqueous solution of Zn(N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> saturated with hydrazoic acid (20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL, 17.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) at room temperature. After three days, the resulting colorless crystals which separated were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 0.94<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 70%). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">30</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">44</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">60</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf> (1750.84<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g/mol): C, 20.6; H, 2.5; N, 48.0. Found: C, 20.5; H, 2.5; N, 48.3%. Selected IR bands (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3537 (s,br), 3459 (s,br), 3358 (s), 3219 (m), 2168 (s,sh), 2099 (vs), 2076 (vs), 2037 (s,sh), 1628 (s), 1594 (s), 1505 (s), 1458 (s), 1350 (m), 1311 (m), 1279 (s) 1204 (w), 1143 (w), 1075 (w), 1029 (w), 807 (m), 698 (m), 660 (m), 605 (w), 519 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st045">
<ce:italic>catena</ce:italic>-[Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(μ<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>-4-HOpy)(μ<ce:inf loc="post">1,1</ce:inf>-N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>]·H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0035" view="all">The complex was prepared by dissolving 4-hydroxypyridine (0.85<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 8.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) in an aqueous solution of Zn(N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> saturated with hydrazoic acid (20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL, 8.9<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol Zn) at 80<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C, then the resulting solution was allowed to stand at room temperature. After three days, the colorless crystals which separated were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 0.76<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 42%). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">13</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (412.02<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g/mol): C, 14.6; H, 1.7; N, 44.2%. Found: C, 14.5; H, 1.4; N, 44.5%. Selected IR bands (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3305 (s,br), 2133 (vs), 2107 (vs), 1631 (s), 1575 (m), 1509 (vs), 1465 (s), 1305 (m), 1277 (w), 1253 (s); 1233 (w), 1193 (s), 1171 (m), 1084 (w), 998 (m), 859 (m), 835 (w), 791 (m), 709 (w), 693 (m), 591 (w), 557 (s), 525 (m), 509 (m), 423 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st050">
<ce:italic>catena</ce:italic>-[Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(μ<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>-4-amtz)(μ<ce:inf loc="post">1,1</ce:inf>-N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>] (<ce:bold>3</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">The complex was prepared following the same procedure described for complex <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> except 4-amino-4H-1,2,4-triazole was used instead of 4-hydroxypyridine. The colorless crystals which separated in the following day were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 1.23<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 72%). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> (382.99<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g/mol): C, 6.3; H, 1.1; N, 58.5%. Found: C, 6.3; H, 1.0; N, 58.3%. Selected IR bands (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3320 (s), 3213 (m), 3141 (m), 3122 (m), 2075 (vs), 1634 (m), 1534 (m), 1474 (w), 1389 (w), 1299 (m), 1205 (m), 1076 (m); 1023 (m), 989 (m), 917 (w), 883 (s), 801 (w), 738 (w), 680 (w), 611 (s), 429 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st055">
<ce:italic>catena</ce:italic>-[Zn(5-Et,2-Me-py)(μ<ce:inf loc="post">1,1</ce:inf>-N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>] (<ce:bold>4</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0045" view="all">ZnSO<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>·7H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.29<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), NaN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf> (0.26<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and 5-ethyl-2-methylpyridine (0.12<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) were dissolved in 22<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O at 60° C. After slow cooling of the clear solution to room temperature small amount of white needles were separated (yield: 0.19<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 70%). These were collected by filtration and dried in air. <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">11</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">7</ce:inf>Zn (270.63<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g/mol): C, 35.5; H, 4.1; N, 36.2%. Found: C, 35.3; H, 4.1; N, 36.1%. Selected IR bands (ATR-IR, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 2090 (vs), 2063 (vs), 1503 (s), 1444 (m), 1345 (m), 1286 (m), 1192 (m), 1138 (s), 1065 (w), 925 (m), 849 (m), 811 (m), 757 (m), 663 (m), 601 (m), 430 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st060">
<ce:italic>catena</ce:italic>-[Zn(2-O-py-N-oxide)(μ<ce:inf loc="post">1,1</ce:inf>-N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)] (<ce:bold>5</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0050" view="all">A mixture of ZnSO<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>·7H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (2.59<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 9<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), 2-hydroxypyridine-<ce:italic>N</ce:italic>-oxide (0.33<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) and NaN<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf> (1.17<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 18<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) were dissolved in H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (14<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) and the resulting solution was allowed to crystallize at room temperature. In the following day, the colorless crystals which separated were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 0.45<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 64%). <ce:italic>Anal</ce:italic>. Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">5</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>Zn (235.53<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g/mol): C, 25.5; H, 2.6; N, 23.8. Found: C, 25.3; H, 2.5; N, 23.7%. Selected IR bands (ATR-IR, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3213 (s,br), 2563 (w), 2112 (vs), 2064 (vs), 1621 (s), 1549 (w), 1512 (vs), 1446 (m), 1363 (m), 1285(m), 1230 (w), 1180 (s), 1148 (w), 1109 (m), 924 (w), 884 (m), 846 (w), 783 (w), 741 (m), 690 (w), 609 (m), 545 (m), 448 (w).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Preparation

 catena-[(3-Hampy)2[Zn7(N3)16(3-ampy)4]⋅3H2O] (1)

The complex was prepared by dissolving 3-aminopyridine (0.43g, 4.6mmol) in an aqueous solution of Zn(N3)2 saturated with hydrazoic acid (20mL, 17.8mmol) at room temperature. After three days, the resulting colorless crystals which separated were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 0.94g, 70%). Anal. Calc. for C30H44N60O3Zn7 (1750.84g/mol): C, 20.6; H, 2.5; N, 48.0. Found: C, 20.5; H, 2.5; N, 48.3%. Selected IR bands (KBr, cm-1): 3537 (s,br), 3459 (s,br), 3358 (s), 3219 (m), 2168 (s,sh), 2099 (vs), 2076 (vs), 2037 (s,sh), 1628 (s), 1594 (s), 1505 (s), 1458 (s), 1350 (m), 1311 (m), 1279 (s) 1204 (w), 1143 (w), 1075 (w), 1029 (w), 807 (m), 698 (m), 660 (m), 605 (w), 519 (w).

 catena-[Zn2(μ2-4-HOpy)(μ1,1-N3)4]⋅H2O (2)

The complex was prepared by dissolving 4-hydroxypyridine (0.85g, 8.8mmol) in an aqueous solution of Zn(N3)2 saturated with hydrazoic acid (20mL, 8.9mmol Zn) at 80°C, then the resulting solution was allowed to stand at room temperature. After three days, the colorless crystals which separated were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 0.76g, 42%). Anal. Calc. for C5H7N13O2Zn2 (412.02g/mol): C, 14.6; H, 1.7; N, 44.2%. Found: C, 14.5; H, 1.4; N, 44.5%. Selected IR bands (KBr, cm-1): 3305 (s,br), 2133 (vs), 2107 (vs), 1631 (s), 1575 (m), 1509 (vs), 1465 (s), 1305 (m), 1277 (w), 1253 (s); 1233 (w), 1193 (s), 1171 (m), 1084 (w), 998 (m), 859 (m), 835 (w), 791 (m), 709 (w), 693 (m), 591 (w), 557 (s), 525 (m), 509 (m), 423 (w).

 catena-[Zn2(μ2-4-amtz)(μ1,1-N3)4] (3)

The complex was prepared following the same procedure described for complex 2 except 4-amino-4H-1,2,4-triazole was used instead of 4-hydroxypyridine. The colorless crystals which separated in the following day were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 1.23g, 72%). Anal. Calc. for C2H4N16Zn2 (382.99g/mol): C, 6.3; H, 1.1; N, 58.5%. Found: C, 6.3; H, 1.0; N, 58.3%. Selected IR bands (KBr, cm-1): 3320 (s), 3213 (m), 3141 (m), 3122 (m), 2075 (vs), 1634 (m), 1534 (m), 1474 (w), 1389 (w), 1299 (m), 1205 (m), 1076 (m); 1023 (m), 989 (m), 917 (w), 883 (s), 801 (w), 738 (w), 680 (w), 611 (s), 429 (w).

 catena-[Zn(5-Et,2-Me-py)(μ1,1-N3)2] (4)

ZnSO4⋅7H2O (0.29g, 1mmol), NaN3 (0.26g, 4mmol) and 5-ethyl-2-methylpyridine (0.12g, 1mmol) were dissolved in 22mL H2O at 60° C. After slow cooling of the clear solution to room temperature small amount of white needles were separated (yield: 0.19g, 70%). These were collected by filtration and dried in air. Anal. Calc. for C8H11N7Zn (270.63g/mol): C, 35.5; H, 4.1; N, 36.2%. Found: C, 35.3; H, 4.1; N, 36.1%. Selected IR bands (ATR-IR, cm-1): 2090 (vs), 2063 (vs), 1503 (s), 1444 (m), 1345 (m), 1286 (m), 1192 (m), 1138 (s), 1065 (w), 925 (m), 849 (m), 811 (m), 757 (m), 663 (m), 601 (m), 430 (w).

 catena-[Zn(2-O-py-N-oxide)(μ1,1-N3)(H2O)] (5)

A mixture of ZnSO4⋅7H2O (2.59g, 9mmol), 2-hydroxypyridine-N-oxide (0.33g, 3mmol) and NaN3 (1.17g, 18mmol) were dissolved in H2O (14mL) and the resulting solution was allowed to crystallize at room temperature. In the following day, the colorless crystals which separated were collected by filtration and dried in air (yield: 0.45g, 64%). Anal. Calc. for C5H6N4O3Zn (235.53g/mol): C, 25.5; H, 2.6; N, 23.8. Found: C, 25.3; H, 2.5; N, 23.7%. Selected IR bands (ATR-IR, cm-1): 3213 (s,br), 2563 (w), 2112 (vs), 2064 (vs), 1621 (s), 1549 (w), 1512 (vs), 1446 (m), 1363 (m), 1285(m), 1230 (w), 1180 (s), 1148 (w), 1109 (m), 924 (w), 884 (m), 846 (w), 783 (w), 741 (m), 690 (w), 609 (m), 545 (m), 448 (w).
